Basic: Basic Greetings: こんにちは, さようなら, ありがとう
Colors: 赤, 青, 緑, 黄
Basic Body Parts: 頭, 手, 足
Simple Questions: 何? 誰? どこ?
Yes and No: はい and いいえ
Please and Thank You: お願いします, ありがとう
Beginner: Introduction to Japanese: Hiragana and Katakana
Basic Kanji: Common Characters and Stroke Order
Particles: は, が, を, に, で
Essential Vocabulary: Family, Colors, and Days
Asking Questions: Question Words and Patterns
Basic Verbs: Present and Past Tense
Intermediate: Verb Conjugation: Te-form, Ta-form, and Conditional
Aspect Markers: ている, てある, ておく
Modal Expressions: Ability, Permission, and Necessity
Advanced: Advanced Kanji: Complex Characters and Readings
Literary Japanese: Classical and Modern Texts
Business Japanese: Keigo and Professional Communication
Formal Writing: Academic and Business Documents
Cultural Texts: Literature, History, and Media
Regional Variations: Dialects and Standard Japanese
